function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unintentional supply of outdoor air due to porous building materials or other pathways","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne infection due to uncontrolled ventilation","Mitigation":"Seal cracks in the building fabric, use pressure testing to identify infiltration points, and implement ventilation control measures","Technologies":"Ventilation control systems, pressure testing equipment","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building managers, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inaccurate measurement of ventilation rates leading to assumption of adequate outdoor air supply","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne infection due to inadequate ventilation","Mitigation":"Use direct air flow measurements, monitor CO2 levels, and implement ventilation rate monitoring systems","Technologies":"Air flow measurement devices, CO2 monitors, ventilation rate sensors","People":"Building managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, facilities management"}]}
